Docs.param: The name of the gallery image version to be created. Needs to follow semantic version name pattern: The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer. Format: <MajorVersion>.<MinorVersion>.<Patch>.
Docs.exception: is an empty string, and was expected to be non-empty.
